title: Programming
content: Strong proficiency in JavaScript, Python, and Java.
Experience with web development using HTML, CSS, and various frameworks (React, Angular).
Familiarity with backend development and databases (Node.js, MongoDB, SQL).
Understanding of data structures and algorithms.
Version control using Git and collaboration on platforms like GitHub.

title: Graphic Design
content: Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).
Experience in creating visually appealing graphics and layouts.
Understanding of color theory, typography, and design principles.
Ability to create logos, banners, and marketing materials.
Knowledge of UI/UX design principles for web and mobile applications.

title: Communication
content: Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Experience in crafting clear and concise documentation.
Strong presentation skills and ability to convey complex ideas.
